name: premierpredictor
title: Premier Predictor
text: Premier League predictor app designed for users to correctly predict the scores of each match to score points, as well as creating mini-leagues to compete with friends. Users can also check live match scores and stats.

This is built using the Ionic framework, with a distributed back-end written in multiple languages, communicating via gRPC. The back-end is fully unit tested using TDD and is currently being hosted using Kubernetes on Google Cloud Platform.
The database used to store user data, match results and live match stat data is MongoDB. For the 18/19 season PostgreSQL and DynamoDB were used.

Websockets are used to send the live match data automatically to the user's device when the match is in-play. Scheduled AWS Lambda functions are used to automatically check if games are in-play and to retrieve the live data.

A scheduled AWS Lambda function is also used to automatically call an API to update user scores. All match data is retrieved from an external API, the results are then used to compare against each user's predictions to assign points.
The app uses adverts to generate revenue. The adverts are provided by Google's Admob service.

reviews.name: Reg Shaw
text: A simple, great app for creating a league to have fun predicting premier league results.
Great support as well - a problem in accessing the app was resolved very quickly by the developer, who responded very promptly to emails. Recommended.

reviews.name: Jmini45
text: Now that the BBC predictor game is gone I looked for another app for predictor and I must say that I am impressed with this app... great UI and scoring system ... everything seems to be working nicely also

reviews.name: Jay Montrose
text: This app is very impressive as it is everything you need in a predictor app. You can create mini leagues to compete against friends and it is very fun. There is sometimes issues with the loading of the app but the makers of this app reacts to this exceptionally when letting them know by email via their website. This is also impressive how they respond to you too and give you updates.

reviews.name: Calvin Scott
text: After enjoying the world cup predictor it was great to see an app for the Premier League. App is easy to use and has plenty of new features

reviews.name: msader
text: Looks better than the World Cup one. Can’t wait.

text: I love this app. Know nothing about football yet am beating everyone in my league!!!
